topic.title: Return from Bypass 2 to Static Mode

li.p:
Make Source 2 active:
Remove Source 2 Key from top Kirk-Key block on top of dead-front panel.
Insert Source 2 Key into S2 lock on Source 2 MCCB.
Turn S2 Key to open lock on Source 2 MCCB.
Close Source 2 MCCB.
Verify that Source 2 (SCR 2) is active: check the one-line image on the STS Monitor on Home screen to verify that SCR 2 (Source 2) is the active path. DO NOT PROCEED IF SOURCE 2 IS NOT ACTIVE! You will drop the load when you turnoff Bypass Source 2.

Turn OFF Bypass Source 2:
Open (turn OFF) Bypass Source 2 MCCB.
Turn key in Bypass Source 2 to lock open.
Remove key from Bypass Source 2 MCCB lock.
Insert key into Bypass Source 2 position in top Kirk-Key blocks on dead front panel.
Turn key to retract locking bar.

Make Source 1 active:
Remove Source 1 key from Source 1 key position in top key blocks in dead front panel.
Insert key into Source 1 MCCB lock.
Turn key to retract locking bar.
Close S1 MCCB.

body.p: STS is now in Static Mode.
